required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Delivering Health: Addressing Diabetes and Food Insecurity
clinical_study.official_title: Delivering Health: An Integrated Approach to Address Diabetes in the Context of Food Insecurity

brief_summary.textblock: Develop, implement, and evaluate the effectiveness of an intervention to use home-delivery of Type 2 diabetes (T2D)-appropriate food boxes with plain language adapted education materials to improve the nutritional health, physical activity, and health outcomes of low-income food insecure people with T2D in northwest Arkansas.

detailed_description.textblock: Develop, implement, and evaluate the effectiveness of an intervention to use home-delivery of Type 2 diabetes (T2D)-appropriate food boxes with plain language adapted education materials to improve the nutritional health, physical activity, and health outcomes of low-income food insecure people with T2D in Northwest Arkansas.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: All participants will be assigned to a single intervention arm.

primary_outcome.description: A Siemens analyzer will be utilized to calculate HbA1c (%) for each participant at every time point. Changes in the primary outcome measure will be assessed from baseline to each follow-up time point.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Type 2 Diabetes Appropriate Food Boxes + Diabetes Education
arm_group.description: All participants will be assigned to a single intervention arm. The intervention includes weekly delivery of type 2 diabetes-appropriate food boxes that include diabetes self-management education materials.

intervention.intervention_name: Type 2 Diabetes Appropriate Food Boxes + Diabetes Education
intervention.description: All participants will be assigned to a single intervention arm. The intervention includes weekly delivery of type 2 diabetes-appropriate food boxes that include diabetes self-management education materials.
intervention.arm_group_label: Type 2 Diabetes Appropriate Food Boxes + Diabetes Education

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Screen positive for food insecurity
- 18 years of age or older
- Type 2 diabetes, confirmed by HbA1c equal to or greater than 7.0%
Exclusion Criteria:
- Conditions making it unlikely the participant will be able to follow the protocol, such as terminal illness, non-ambulatory, severe mental illness, severely impaired vision or hearing, eating disorder, or plans to move out of the geographic region
- Only one adult per household will be enrolled
- Individuals under 18 years old are excluded because the intervention is designed for adults with T2D
- Pregnant

facility.name: University of Arkansas for Medical Sciences Northwest
